signRiverCrossing.char: To the road to river crossing

signDungeon.speech: It is said unspeakable horrors lurk beneath the surface

signGardenForest.speech: Many noises can be heard echoing through the trees, only the bravest enter

medea3.speech: My father is both amazed and fearful of your recent accomplishments, Out of respect he will allow you to complete your challenge but we must hurry
Artemis is guarding the gateway to the garden, she will only allow access with a worthy sacrifice
Orpheus, please go to the forest and the dungeon nearby, you will need to gather ingredients. Bring them to the garden's gate and throw them into the fire
With your soothing voice and talent with the lyre, impress Artemis and allow Jason to fulfil his destiny!
I will try my best my lady
